## Summary
This PR adds the new **UpdateProperty.jsx** page for Property Managers.

## Includes
- UpdateProperty.jsx
- UpdateProperty.css
- Routing update
- Backend endpoints (GET + PATCH)
- PropertyUpdate schema

## Testing
1. Login as PM
2. Visit /manager/property/:id/edit
3. Update values
4. Confirm successful PATCH request
